content.body: annevk: About my obsession (e.g., in spec-review comments) with always (over)using hyphens (to avoid ambiguity): I asked ChatGPT about it, and https://gist.github.com/sideshowbarker/27b60bbde6a52adf1b80edbb4960e85f is the response I got.
